Read full topic

item.title: Having a error
item.dc:creator: @Cheesehunk Cheesehunk
item.description:
@Cheesehunk wrote:

Begin Loadbitmaps; Repeat FindBMPS1; Until(FindBitmap(Mainpage, x, y)) FindBMPS2; Until(FindBitmap(Low, x, y)) FindBMPS3; Until(FindBitmap(World, x, y)) FindBMPS4; Until(FindBitmap(user, x, y)) UsernamePassword; FindBMPS5; Until(FindBitmap(login, x, y)) FindBMPS6; Until(FindBitmap(clicktoplay, x, y)) End.

On this section of the script, you tell the script to repeat FindBMPS1; until the Bitmap MainPage is found. Which is correct. However, on the next line you have FindBMPS2; and then an until statement. One problem, for every until there is a repeat, and you have 6 untils, and only on repeat.

Here is the fixed code:

Begin Loadbitmaps; Repeat FindBMPS1; wait(10); Until(FindBitmap(Mainpage, x, y)) Repeat FindBMPS2; wait(10); Until(FindBitmap(Low, x, y)) Repeat FindBMPS3; wait(10); Until(FindBitmap(World, x, y)) Repeat FindBMPS4; wait(10); Until(FindBitmap(user, x, y)) Repeat UsernamePassword; wait(250+random(250); FindBMPS5; wait(10); Until(FindBitmap(login, x, y)) Repeat FindBMPS6; wait(10); Until(FindBitmap(clicktoplay, x, y)) End.

I put thw wait(10); in each repeat loop, because SCAR will get really laggy without them. They are hardly noticable, so don’t worry about that.

Good job by the way!

Read full topic

item.title: Having a error
item.dc:creator: @teh_spede Teh Spede
item.description:
@teh_spede wrote:

So I made a autologin for runescape that starts from the mainpage, but there is a error that goes like this:Line 239: [Error] (239:1): Identifier expected in script C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\Scripts\loginni.scar
and here is the script:

[code]Program New;

Const
Username = ’ ';
Password = ’ ';

‘E2B67F093D1B7329D7B1EDB0F17144DA7’);
End;

Procedure ClickBMPS;
Begin
wait(300+random(32))
movemousesmooth(x,y)
wait(32+random(16))
clickmouse(x,y,true)
End;

Procedure FindBMPS1;
Begin
if(findBitmap(Mainpage,x,y))then
Begin
ClickBMPS;
End;
End;

Procedure FindBMPS2;
Begin
if(findBitmap(Low,x,y))then
Begin
ClickBMPS;
End;
End;

Procedure FindBMPS3;
Begin
if(findBitmap(World,x,y))then
Begin
ClickBMPS;
End;
End;

Procedure FindBMPS4;
Begin
if(findBitmap(user,x,y))then
Begin
ClickBMPS;
End;
End;

Procedure UsernamePassword;
Begin
Wait(500+random(160));
SendKeysSilent(Username);
Wait(500+random(160));
SendKeysSilent(chr(13));
Wait(500+random(160));
SendKeysSilent(Password);
Wait(100+random(36));
End;

Procedure FindBMPS5;
Begin
if(findBitmap(login,x,y))then
Begin
ClickBMPS;
End;
End;

Procedure FindBMPS6;
Begin
Wait(3000)
if(findBitmap(clicktoplay,x,y))then
Begin
ClickBMPS;
End;
End;

Begin
Loadbitmaps;
Repeat
FindBMPS1;
Until(FindBitmap(Mainpage, x, y))
FindBMPS2;
Until(FindBitmap(Low, x, y))
FindBMPS3;
Until(FindBitmap(World, x, y))
FindBMPS4;
Until(FindBitmap(user, x, y))
UsernamePassword;
FindBMPS5;
Until(FindBitmap(login, x, y))
FindBMPS6;
Until(FindBitmap(clicktoplay, x, y))
End.[/code]

Read full topic
